alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 16 at 2:10PM EST until December 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SUNDAY TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST SUNDAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 6 feet. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...Coastal Sarasota, Coastal Charlotte and Coastal Lee Counties. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, from 1 AM Sunday to 7 AM EST Monday. For the High Rip Current Risk, from late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota
